summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal waterworks system; and providing for the acquisition of the water supply system of C. W. Conklin, John Gerke and C. E. Hayes on 24th Avenue Northwest from West 85th to West 90th Streets, thence west on West 90th to 25th Northwest and north on 25th Northwest to West 91st Street.
